TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit FileIOPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class FileIOPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 允許將 的安全性動作套用至使用宣告式安全性的程式碼。

span.span: Allows security actions for to be applied to code using declarative security.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用絕對路徑會指定檔案和目錄。Files and directories are specified using absolute paths. 時存取檔案，建立或開啟檔案時，就是會執行安全性檢查。When accessing files, a security check is performed when the file is created or opened. 安全性檢查不完成一次，除非關閉並重新開啟該檔案。The security check is not done again unless the file is closed and reopened. 正在檢查權限，當第一次存取檔案，因為開啟檔案時發生一次，讀取和寫入可能會發生多次，最小化安全性檢查，對應用程式效能的影響。Checking permissions when the file is first accessed minimizes the impact of the security check on application performance because opening a file happens only once, while reading and writing can happen multiple times. 允許宣告的範圍取決於用。The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the that is used. 安全性屬性所宣告的安全性資訊會儲存屬性目標的中繼資料，並在執行階段存取系統。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全性屬性僅用於宣告式安全性。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 命令式安全性，使用對應的權限類別。For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class. > [!CAUTION] > `Unrestricted` 授與檔案系統，包括多個可用來存取單一指定檔案的路徑名稱內的所有路徑的權限。`Unrestricted` grants permission for all paths within a file system, including multiple pathnames that can be used to access a single given file. 若要存取至檔案，您必須`Deny`所有可能的檔案路徑。To access to a file, you must `Deny` all possible paths to the file. 比方說，如果\\\server\share 會為對應到網路磁碟機 X`Deny`存取權\\\server\share\file，您必須`Deny` \\\server\share\file X:\file，您可以使用任何其他路徑來存取檔案。For example, if \\\server\share is mapped to the network drive X, to `Deny` access to \\\server\share\file, you must `Deny` \\\server\share\file, X:\file and any other path that you can use to access the file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何要求使用類別，表示要授與程式碼的唯一權限。The following code example demonstrates how to request by using the class, indicating the only permission that is to be granted to the code. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下列範例示範如何要求呼叫的程式碼能夠毫無限制地。The following example shows how to demand that the calling code has unrestricted . 您通常會在 managed 程式庫 (Dll)，以協助防止可能有害的程式碼中的方法或類別提出要求。You typically make demands in managed libraries (DLLs) to help protect methods or classes from potentially harmful code. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定字串值所指定檔案或目錄的完整存取權。

span.span: Gets or sets full access for the file or directory that is specified by the string value.

value.span: 完全存取權的檔案或目錄絕對路徑。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory for full access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性設定的單一檔案或目錄的權限。This property sets access for a single file or directory. 您可以使用其他屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將屬性，以授與指定的目錄完整存取權。The following code example sets the property to grant full access to the specified directory. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CPP/fileiopermissionattribute.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CS/fileiopermissionattribute.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/VB/fileiopermissionattribute.vb#6)]

summary.span: 取得或設定允許的所有檔案存取。

span.span: Gets or sets the permitted access to all files.

value.span: 值的位元組合，表示所有檔案的使用權限。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represents the permissions for all files.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會取得或設定在本機電腦和網路磁碟機上的所有檔案的存取。This property gets or sets the permitted access to all files on the local computer and network drives. 個人值可以決定使用位元`AND`作業。An individual value can be determined by using a bitwise `AND` operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess AllLocalFiles { System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定允許的所有本機檔案存取。

span.span: Gets or sets the permitted access to all local files.

value.span: 值的位元組合，表示所有本機檔案的使用權限。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represents the permissions for all local files.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本機檔案是包含在本機電腦上的檔案。Local files are files contained on the local computer. 不會透過網路磁碟機存取任何檔案是本機的檔案。Any files that are not accessed through a network drive are local files. 個人值可以決定使用位元`AND`作業。An individual value can be determined by using a bitwise `AND` operation.

span.span: Gets or sets append access for the file or directory that is specified by the string value.

value.span: 附加存取權的檔案或目錄絕對路徑。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory for append access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性設定的單一檔案或目錄的權限。This property sets access for a single file or directory. 您可以使用其他屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性，以授與指定目錄中檔案的存取權。The following code example sets the property to grant access to files in the specified directory. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CPP/fileiopermissionattribute.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CS/fileiopermissionattribute.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/VB/fileiopermissionattribute.vb#4)]

member this.ChangeAccessControl : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定可以在其中變更存取控制資訊的檔案或目錄。

span.span: Gets or sets the file or directory in which access control information can be changed.

value.span: 可以在其中變更存取控制資訊之檔案或目錄的絕對路徑。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory in which access control information can be changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會取得或設定的單一檔案或目錄的權限。This property gets or sets access for a single file or directory. 使用其他屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. > [!IMPORTANT] > 存取控制清單 (ACL) 會描述個人或群組，或沒有，在指定的檔案和其屬性的特定動作的權限。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties. 若要變更 ACL 的能力是重要的權限，並應謹慎使用授與。The ability to change an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

span.span: Creates and returns a new .
A that corresponds to this attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 永遠不會由應用程式程式碼，應該只能由安全性系統，呼叫這個方法。This method should be called only by the security system, never by application code. 在編譯時期，屬性會將安全性宣告轉換為中繼資料的序列化形式。At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata. 在中繼資料中的宣告式安全性資料時建立的權限，此方法會傳回對應至這個屬性。Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns that corresponds to this attribute.

exception.span: 存取權受到保護的檔案或目錄的路徑資訊包含無效字元或萬用字元規範。

span.span: The path information for a file or directory for which access is to be secured contains invalid characters or wildcard specifiers.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PathDiscovery { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PathDiscovery : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要授與路徑探索 (Discovery) 的檔案或目錄。

span.span: Gets or sets the file or directory to which to grant path discovery.

value.span: 檔案或目錄的絕對路徑。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路徑探索控制存取權本身的路徑中的資訊。Path discovery controls access to the information in the path itself. 這個值可以保護路徑中的敏感資訊，例如：使用者名稱，以及路徑中所顯示有關目錄結構的資訊。This helps protect sensitive information in the path, such as user names, as well as information about the directory structure revealed in the path. 這個值不能存取由路徑表示的檔案或資料夾。This value does not grant access to files or folders represented by the path. > [!NOTE] > 基於效能考量，只應該授與不到檔案的目錄。For performance reasons, should be granted only to directories, not to files. 例如， C:\test C:\test 等的路徑應該授與權限\\，而非檔案，例如 C:\test\example.txt。For example, permission should be granted to paths such as C:\test and C:\test\\, not to files such as C:\test\example.txt. 這個屬性設定的單一檔案或目錄的權限。This property sets access for a single file or directory. 您可以使用其他屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性，以授與指定目錄中檔案的存取權。The following code example sets the property to grant access to files in the specified directory. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CPP/fileiopermissionattribute.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CS/fileiopermissionattribute.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/VB/fileiopermissionattribute.vb#3)]

summary.span: 取得或設定可以在其中檢視存取控制資訊的檔案或目錄。

span.span: Gets or sets the file or directory in which access control information can be viewed.

value.span: 可以在其中檢視存取控制資訊之檔案或目錄的絕對路徑。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory in which access control information can be viewed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會取得或設定的單一檔案或目錄的權限。This property gets or sets access for a single file or directory. 使用其他屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. > [!IMPORTANT] > 存取控制清單 (ACL) 會描述個人或群組，或沒有，在指定的檔案和其屬性的特定動作的權限。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties. 檢視 ACL 的能力是很重要的權限，並應謹慎使用授與。The ability to view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會設定， ， ，和單一檔案或目錄的屬性。This property sets the , , , and properties for a single file or directory. 使用其他屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. 存取權限適用於檔案資料它們不包含存取控制的內容和。The access rights are for file data only; they do not include the access control properties and . > [!NOTE] > `get`存取子針對 C# 編譯器相容性而提供。The `get` accessor is provided for C# compiler compatibility. C# 編譯器要求是讀取/寫入的屬性。The C# compiler requires attribute properties to be read/write.

span.span: The accessor is called.
